sense.gloss: to be lit (of a lamp, burner, etc.), to catch fire, to ignite, to start burning
to be turned on (of a light, appliance, etc.), to come on

sdata.j: ↑今↑↓いま↓じゃ、ボクのお↑料理↑↓りょうり↓レベルは、１００↑点↑↓てん↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓４５|↑点↑↓てん↓く|らい。スゴイだろ、↑赤↑↓あか↓↑点↑↓てん↓じゃないのさ！
sdata.e: Right now my score in Cooking is about 45 out of 100. Great isn't it? That's not a fail!

sdata.j: ↑明日↑↓あした↓のテスト↑何|↑↓なん↓↑点↑↓てん↓く|らい↑取↑↓と↓れそう？
sdata.e: What do you think you'll score on tomorrow's test?
